name: Asteroids (itch) (Netsu)
description:
This is the classical Asteroids game from the late 90's. You are a spaceship and you have to destroy all the asteroids around you and build up points.

Current High Score: 55 710 by Steve's teacher

Requirements:

  • 16:9 ratio display is recommended, although, not required

Note: This game was made with the help of freeCodeCamp.org's video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H9CSWMxJx84

If you want to help modify the game, get the source code or anything like that, here you go: https://github.com/WeebNetsu/asteroid

Did you beat the high score? Send me a video of you playing the game and beating the score (from beginning to end) and I'll update it :)
